text: In the U.S. Senate, I am committed to advocating for girls in the U.S. & around the globe. On #InternationalDayoftheGirl it’s important to remember that when we empower girls, they change the world. https://t.co/oNLK5UbqNP

Very pleased Pastor Brunson will finally be released from Turkish custody. This is a huge relief for him & his family who has relentlessly advocated for his freedom. The effort to secure his release was bipartisan w/ close cooperation between Congress & the administration. https://t.co/UevXqvIBFU
On #NationalFarmersDay I am grateful for the contributions of Granite State farmers across NH. You play a vital role in NH's economy, and I'll keep fighting for you in Congress.

Thank you to Anne Marie and Jim Zanfagna for sharing the Angels of Addictions portraits in the U.S. Capitol this week, and for everything they’re doing to raise awareness and help bring healing to those who have lost a loved one in the opioid crisis. https://t.co/BPY0GNokJr

Honored to present at the Congressional Law Enforcement Ceremony. These NH officers have demonstrated exceptional service. We recognize not only those being honored, but also those we have lost. Thank you for your sacrifice. https://t.co/Vg2CuAHMA3
My statement on Pastor Brunson finally arriving safely on American soil: https://t.co/mZ6zbYR7ic

The brave members of the @USNavy put their lives on the line to keep our nation safe, and I am incredibly grateful for their service. Thank you for answering the call of duty, and very happy 243rd Birthday! https://t.co/wrigqbnRI0

Janis and other translators face extreme danger for serving the U.S. in Afghanistan, but they are critical to our mission. Grateful for Matt Zeller’s efforts to help him find refuge here. I’ll keep fighting to secure visas for interpreters like Janis. https://t.co/oapIdZLUg0

The scale of the opioid epidemic is staggering but numbers don’t tell the whole story. Families like the Zanfagnas who have lost loved ones and are bravely sharing their stories are increasing awareness and helping to destigmatize substance use disorders. https://t.co/zdeS5KHlkl
49 years later and it feels like just yesterday. Happy Anniversary, Billy! ❤️ https://t.co/NfK9kimbvz
This obit, written by a parent for her daughter who died of an overdose, is heartbreaking, powerful, and a beautiful tribute. It has so much important advice for all of us. https://t.co/i14UKD8Bi9

Important read from the @washingtonpost that highlights the far-reaching impact of @POTUS's reckless decision to not only reinstate, but expand the global gag rule, blocking women & families around the world from accessing the health services they need. https://t.co/gNN9fI1Awt

Protecting & improving the #AffordableCareAct is critical to millions of Americans across the country, including entrepreneurs and small business employees. We’ve seen a reduction in uninsured small biz employees thanks to the #ACA. https://t.co/H0xNZvrD1B

Thank you, @Aly_Raisman, for your courage and leadership in fighting the stigma surrounding child sexual abuse. No child should suffer, and by shedding a light on this experience, you’re opening the world up for survivors. https://t.co/mshafObtFP
Republican leadership told the American people that tax cuts for the rich would pay for themselves. They didn’t. In fact, the GOP tax cuts created a giant budget deficit, as economists predicted.

The impacts of climate change are vast, damaging our environment and threatening wildlife. In NH rising winter temperatures have allowed an overwhelming profusion of ticks, killing 2/3 of baby moose! The signs are there. We need to act on climate. https://t.co/M6EveUMI40

.@JKhashoggi’s final column for the @WashingtonPost is a powerful message about the fundamental role that a free press holds in opening & safeguarding democratic society. His words & legacy remind us all of the peril that journalists around the world face in pursuit of the truth. https://t.co/rlzfHie07R
So great to see the Red Sox heading to the World Series! Let’s keep this historic season rolling and finish the job! #DoDamage https://t.co/FUMhyL0xu6

Friendship House’s support for individuals struggling with substance use disorder changes lives in the North Country. It was wonderful to join the ribbon cutting this morning. I’ll continue to work across the aisle to deliver resources to fund similar programs throughout NH. https://t.co/Aawe46GFlZ

The Glen House Hotel is leading the way in energy efficiency. Their efforts are a great example of local leadership to combat climate change, and the hotel is a model for businesses looking to grow with a focus on sustainability. https://t.co/GHrNWTATpF
Inspired by the participants at this morning’s 5K honoring James Foley. As journalists continue to face threats around the world, we must work together to promote their freedom and safety.

We’ve been watching our granddaughter Annah’s volleyball games since she was in middle school. Friday night we watched her final regular season game as a high school senior. We love watching her play, and I’m so proud of all that she and her team have accomplished over the years. https://t.co/O2ESWCX7Ml

In New Hampshire, we have a proud history of free and fair elections. No eligible voter should be denied access to the polls in our state. The court made the right decision by putting the voting rights of Granite Staters above debunked claims of voter fraud. https://t.co/AbWjWOQUGI

The Trump admin’s new guidance on section 1332 waivers is the latest in a series of attacks on the #ACA & will erode safeguards that help provide Granite Staters with comprehensive, affordable and reliable health care coverage.

The rates of youth suicide in NH are heartbreaking, particularly in the North Country. Check in with your friends and family, and if you or someone you know is struggling or at risk of suicide, please call the suicide prevention lifeline at 1-800-273-8255. https://t.co/0qndaGcr64

Great to see our bipartisan opioid response legislation signed into law. This new law is the product of good-faith negotiations and provides NH with new tools and resources. Fighting this epidemic must always remain an area where Republicans and Democrats can work together.

Very grateful for the work of law enforcement in response to the bombing attempts. It is clear we desperately need civility in our politics & politicians must lead by example by respectfully disagreeing w/o disparaging, or attacking our free press.
Wonderful to join @BIAofNH at their annual dinner. BIA plays a critical role across our state, supporting so many NH businesses, big and small. https://t.co/436gZ97bN5
Time to break out the snow boots! Beautiful scene yesterday on the Kancamagus Highway up north. I’m hearing Mt. Washington got 18 inches! https://t.co/srL1aOK37c
Team Shaheen is ready for Game 3 tonight. We’ll be cheering extra loud so the @RedSox can hear us in LA – GO SOX! #RedSoxNation #DoDamage #WorldSeries https://t.co/qXYGRwSAkz

This has got to stop. The Trump admin & GOP leadership’s efforts to undermine the healthcare marketplace are making healthcare more expensive, harming families, entrepreneurs and small businesses in NH. Time to work across the aisle to lower costs! https://t.co/IEWyFajMdd
Incredible. Proud to be a @RedSox fan and can’t wait to cheer @MookieBetts on again tonight. https://t.co/XUNpnzefEH

Today is Prescription Drug Take Back Day. Until 2PM, sites across NH are available to help Granite Staters dispose of medication. Cleaning out medicine cabinets is a step we can all take to reduce access to opioids in our communities. Find a site near you: https://t.co/YoSXNQWxuf
Absolutely heartbreaking to learn of violence in Pittsburgh. Praying for the Jewish community, city and first responders.
#WorldSeries champs once again!! Huge congrats, @RedSox, on a hard-fought season and incredible series. Can’t wait for you to bring the trophy home to Boston & celebrate with all of #RedSoxNation!

Fascinating visit to @nanocomptech with @NASA officials in Merrimack this morning. Their innovative technology enables lighter spacecraft and launch vehicles. Another great partnership between the public and private sectors, thanks to the SBIR program. https://t.co/y6aj7XPTeW

This anti-heroin task force grant will help law enforcement stop the trafficking of narcotics across state lines. I’ll keep working w/ officials throughout the region to ensure first responders have the tools necessary to end this crisis. https://t.co/PGYdatI1hG

The @MilliporeSigma facility in Jaffrey employs 950 and ensures that NH plays an important role in the development of life-saving products. Exciting to witness their innovative medical technology up close. https://t.co/RadPLoqrUI

I joined students @KeeneState_ for a conversation on foreign policy. They came prepared with very thoughtful questions. Our democracy in America and our global stability depend on civility, dialogue and compromise. This next generation will help bring us closer to that ideal. https://t.co/I0xLyXqWXF
The health insurance open enrollment period begins on Thursday and I encourage Granite Staters to visit https://t.co/jZzBcoEXgY to shop for the best plan for them and their families.

Reminder – The health insurance open enrollment period starts TOMORROW and runs through December 15th! If you need to sign up for health insurance or need to change your coverage, make sure to visit https://t.co/jZzBcoEXgY to find a plan that works for you. https://t.co/D688MNPVPG

I’m encouraged by the Trump admin’s call for a ceasefire in Yemen. The humanitarian situation is dire & it’s past time for the U.S. to use our leverage to help end this horrific war. https://t.co/NoBwydObcz
The health insurance open enrollment period begins today! If you need to sign up for health care coverage or change your plan, visit https://t.co/jZzBcoEXgY by December 15th. https://t.co/hbS9CotRnd

Diabetes is a chronic condition impacting millions of Americans. During #NationalDiabetesMonth we must recommit to investing in diabetes treatment, research & education. I’ll keep working across the aisle to advance legislation that addresses these important priorities.

Wonderful to be at PSU to celebrate the new location of the Plymouth Academic Support Services program, which provides support for students through the TRIO program. Glad to see NH students benefit from these federal resources and achieving their dream of a college degree. https://t.co/GyAtGffcS2

Medication-assisted treatment is the gold standard for substance use disorder treatment & is a critical tool in fighting the opioid epidemic. Great to speak with LRGHealthcare officials in Franklin about how they’re using MAT to help Granite Staters with substance use disorders. https://t.co/FoklbGhNQK

Tomorrow is Election Day. If you’re an eligible voter, remember to exercise your civic duty & be an active participant in our democracy. Visit the NH Secretary of State’s website to confirm your polling location & make a plan to vote. Your voice matters! https://t.co/lcomBCkQvy

This is a step in the right direction but more reforms are needed at USOC and other governing bodies. There must be accountability across Olympic sports to ensure the safety, health and support of all athletes. https://t.co/Qb4UokUbMr

Congrats to Testing for Pease co-founder Andrea Amico on her EPA Citizen Excellence in Community Involvement Award for her efforts to raise awareness & fight for response measures to combat PFAS exposure in drinking water supplies. https://t.co/Ux5dVpAZv8

The President is not above the law which is why it is incredibly concerning that President Trump has fired the Attorney General and handpicked an acting Attorney General who will now oversee Special Counsel Mueller’s investigation.

The shooting last night in California is so heartbreaking. Once again, lives taken far too soon and trauma that will last a lifetime. My thoughts are with the victims’ families, survivors and local law enforcement who tragically lost one of their own.

We desperately need more civility in our public discourse and it’s incumbent on all of us to denounce behavior that crosses a line. While I strongly disagree with many of @TuckerCarlson's opinions, I defend his 1st Amendment right to voice those opinions...
Go Caleb! Exciting to see a Granite Stater winning in the Jeopardy Teen Tournament. Looking forward to the semifinals! https://t.co/Eu5JwyBL86

.@SenToddYoung & I are calling on the admin to end U.S. air refueling of Saudi coalition aircraft in Yemen. With 14 million Yemenis on the verge of starvation, the U.S. must send a clear message that we expect Saudi Arabia to engage in negotiations to end the civil war.

Big congrats to @DonnaSoucy, who was unanimously voted Senate President, and @DanFeltesNH who will serve as Senate Majority Leader. Donna and Dan are principled leaders who will fight everyday for Granite State families. #NHPolitics

Our veterans put their lives on the line for our freedom. On #VeteransDay and every day I am grateful for these brave men and women and their families, those who continue to serve today and those who made the ultimate sacrifice to protect our nation. https://t.co/ZsgHiP94IT
Beautiful morning honoring Granite State veterans and their families at the New Hampshire Veterans Cemetery. Thank you for your service to New Hampshire and the country. https://t.co/tZuZPGNLyq

The legacy of the USS Thresher holds an important place in our hearts in NH, having been built at the Portsmouth Naval Shipyard. 55 years after it tragically sank & took the lives of 129 men, I’m advocating for a memorial at Arlington National Cemetery to honor the heroes lost. https://t.co/0BUFHDXfZE

Too many Granite Staters are living with mental illness, and we must continue to discuss mental health to reduce the stigma. Very proud to see this group of young people form “Concord Together.” Efforts like these make a difference. https://t.co/oPllgP9ymU
GEAR UP will support almost 2,000 students in Manchester – creating opportunities so that every child can succeed in our schools. Thrilled to see this program will begin soon! https://t.co/Qclf9zhy5E

More than 30 million Americans are affected by diabetes, but 1 in 4 of those affected don’t know they have it. On #WorldDiabetesDay, let’s raise awareness of this disease so that we are better able to fight it. It’s time to find a cure.
Wonderful to join students from Sunapee at the Capitol this afternoon. They asked such great questions that I told them I hope they come back to intern in my office! https://t.co/3eQjnWuFln

Such a tragic loss. James Dobson went above & beyond to improve the lives of others & was tragically killed while raising money for cancer treatment. NH is mourning the death of a generous man who loved to put a smile on people’s faces. My heart goes out to his family & friends. https://t.co/sbOy1mpcW5

Excited to join New England Senators in honoring the @RedSox World Series Championship. This team will go down in history, not just for winning the World Series, but for being one of the greatest Red Sox teams of all time. #RedSoxNation https://t.co/T0KG24zSPZ

A positive first step. However, everyone who had a hand in Khashoggi’s murder should be sanctioned. It’s clear this list is not comprehensive. America’s response has significant implications for our international credibility. We must send a clear message standing for human rights https://t.co/pf4pwRoTPV
Congrats @MookieBetts on being named AL MVP! So well deserved. Love watching you play, and proud to have you represent #RedSoxNation. https://t.co/8wxwMqg30g

My thoughts are with those impacted by the devastating fires in CA. This is a nightmare for so many who haven’t been able to locate loved ones. Thank you to firefighters, first responders & good Samaritans who are working day & night to help all those affected. https://t.co/H5EezpuO0N
If you need to sign up for health care coverage or change your plan, don’t wait. The open enrollment period ends December 15th. #GetCovered https://t.co/66VqXThcFv

This bipartisan legislation is necessary to hold Saudi officials accountable for the barbaric murder of Jamal Khashoggi, continued detention of activists & indiscriminate bombing campaign in Yemen. Congress must stand on the side of human rights and democratic values. https://t.co/aJwxBWm9F8
